[event]
# to Nazia Highlands
type=event
location=32,59,4,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/nazia_highlands.txt,13,7
repeat=false
tooltip=Nazia Highlands

[event]
# launch mine cart
type=event
location=48,40,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
mapmod=object,48,40,0;collision,48,40,0
power=199
power_path=48,40,48,32
remove_item=1016
repeat=false
requires_not_status=emp_naziamines_cleared,emp_naziamines_finish
requires_status=emp_naziamines_init,emp_naziamines_dynamite
soundfx=soundfx/environment/minecart.ogg
tooltip=Empty Mine Cart
unset_status=emp_naziamines_dynamite

[event]
# launch mine cart
type=event
location=48,40,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
mapmod=object,48,40,0;collision,48,40,0
power=199
power_path=48,40,48,32
remove_item=1016
repeat=false
requires_not_status=emp_naziamines_cleared,emp_naziamines_finish
requires_status=emp_naziamines_init,emp_naziamines_dynamite
set_status=emp_naziamines_cleared
soundfx=soundfx/environment/minecart.ogg
tooltip=Empty Mine Cart
unset_status=emp_naziamines_dynamite,emp_naziamines_door_locked

reward_xp=6400

unset_status=emp_naziamines_init,emp_naziamines_cleared

location=4,0,1,1

requires_status=emp_naziamines_chest
unset_status=emp_naziamines_chest

location=41,35,1,1

[event]
# Locked Door
type=event
location=47,31,2,2
activate=on_trigger
cooldown=1s
hotspot=location
msg=You found a door, but it appears to be barricaded from the inside.
requires_not_status=emp_naziamines_cleared,emp_naziamines_finish
requires_status=emp_naziamines_init
